commands.name: az functionapp keys delete
commands.syntax:
az functionapp keys delete --key-name
                           --key-type {functionKeys, masterKey, systemKeys}
                           --name
                           --resource-group
                           [--slot]
examples: az functionapp keys delete -g MyResourceGroup -n MyFunctionAppName --key-type masterKey --key-name MyKeyName

commands.name: az functionapp keys list
examples: az functionapp keys list -g MyResourceGroup -n MyFunctionAppName

commands.name: az functionapp keys set
commands.summary: Create or update a function app key.
commands.syntax:
az functionapp keys set --key-name
                        --key-type {functionKeys, masterKey, systemKeys}
                        --name
                        --resource-group
                        [--key-value]
                        [--slot]
examples: az functionapp keys set -g MyResourceGroup -n MyFunctionAppName --key-type functionKeys --key-name MyKeyName --key-value MyKeyValue
